_description: Visual format typology centralized from visualizer/docs/VISUAL_FORMAT_TYPOLOGY.md

formats.name: Network Graph
formats.use_when: Showing relationships between entities (actors, concepts, citations)
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a network graph showing [entities] as nodes connected by edges representing [relationship]. Use node size for [importance]. Color-code by [category].
formats.example_prompt:
Create a network graph visualization.

NODES: [list of entities with optional attributes for size/color]
EDGES: [list of connections with optional weights]

- Node size represents [importance/centrality/mentions]
- Node color indicates [category/type/sentiment]
- Edge thickness shows [strength/frequency]
- Cluster related nodes spatially
- Label significant nodes

formats.name: Chord Diagram
formats.use_when: Showing bilateral relationships with magnitude (trade, communication, co-occurrence)
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a chord diagram showing flows between [entities]. Arc thickness represents [magnitude]. Color each entity distinctly.

formats.name: Hierarchical Tree
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a hierarchical tree diagram with [root] at top. Show [levels] of hierarchy. Use consistent spacing.

formats.name: Radial Tree
formats.use_when: Showing influence radiating from center, concept maps
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a radial tree with [center_concept] at center. Branches extend outward to [related_concepts]. Size branches by [importance].

formats.name: Force-Directed Layout
formats.use_when: Showing organic clustering and community structure
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a force-directed network layout where related nodes cluster together. Show communities through spatial grouping.

categories.name: Flow / Process Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations showing flows, processes, and transformations

formats.name: Sankey Diagram
formats.use_when: Showing flows with quantities (money, resources, conversions)
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a Sankey diagram showing flows from [sources] to [targets]. Width represents [value]. Color flows by [category].
formats.example_prompt:
Create a Sankey diagram showing resource flows.

FLOWS:
[source] → [target]: [value]
[source] → [target]: [value]

- Flow width proportional to value
- Color flows by [source category / destination / value range]
- Order sources and targets logically
- Label flows with values

formats.name: Alluvial Diagram
formats.use_when: Showing how entities change category over time
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create an alluvial diagram showing how [entities] transition between [categories] across [time_periods].

formats.name: Flowchart
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a flowchart showing the process from [start] to [end]. Diamond shapes for decisions. Arrows show flow direction.

formats.name: Process Flow
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a process flow diagram showing [process_name]. Each stage receives [inputs] and produces [outputs].

formats.name: Value Stream Map
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a value stream map showing [process]. Indicate cycle time and wait time at each step. Highlight bottlenecks.

categories.name: Temporal Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations showing time-based data and sequences

formats.name: Timeline
formats.use_when: Showing sequence of events over time
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a horizontal timeline from [start_date] to [end_date]. Place events at their dates. Color-code by [category].

formats.name: Gantt Chart
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a Gantt chart showing [tasks] with start and end dates. Show dependencies as arrows.

formats.name: Parallel Timelines
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create parallel timelines for [domains]. Show synchronous events aligned vertically. Each track labeled.

formats.name: Cycle Diagram
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a circular cycle diagram showing [phases] in sequence. Indicate typical duration of each phase.

formats.name: Sparklines
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create small sparkline charts showing trend for each [entity]. Highlight peaks and troughs.

categories.name: Comparative Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations for comparing entities or values

formats.name: Matrix / Heatmap
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a heatmap with [row_entities] as rows and [column_entities] as columns. Color intensity represents [value]. Include legend.

formats.name: Quadrant Chart
formats.use_when: Showing position on two dimensions (power-interest, impact-effort)
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a 2x2 quadrant chart with [x_axis_label] horizontal and [y_axis_label] vertical. Plot [items] as labeled points.
formats.example_prompt:
Create a 2x2 quadrant chart.

X-AXIS: [dimension] (low to high)
Y-AXIS: [dimension] (low to high)

ITEMS:
[item]: x=[score], y=[score]

- Plot items as labeled circles
- Size circles by [optional third dimension]
- Label quadrants: [TL, TR, BL, BR names]
- Show axis labels and values

formats.name: Radar / Spider Chart
formats.use_when: Comparing multiple entities across multiple dimensions
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a radar chart comparing [entities] across [dimensions]. Each entity is a different colored polygon.

formats.name: Bar Chart
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a horizontal bar chart showing [categories] ranked by [value]. Include value labels.

formats.name: Grouped Bar Chart
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a grouped bar chart comparing [groups] across [categories]. Use distinct colors per group.

formats.name: Dot Plot / Strip Plot
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a dot plot showing [items] positioned by [value] within each [category] strip.

categories.name: Part-of-Whole Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations showing composition and hierarchical breakdowns

formats.name: Treemap
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a treemap showing [hierarchy]. Rectangle size represents [value]. Color-code by [top_level_category].

formats.name: Sunburst
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a sunburst diagram with [root] at center. Concentric rings show hierarchy levels. Arc size represents [value].

formats.name: Stacked Bar
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a stacked bar chart showing composition of [components] for each [category].

formats.name: Waterfall Chart
formats.use_when: Showing cumulative effect of sequential changes
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a waterfall chart starting at [start]. Show each [change] as addition or subtraction leading to [end].

formats.name: Marimekko
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a Marimekko chart where bar width represents [x_total] and segments represent [y_composition].

categories.name: Spatial / Set Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations showing set relationships and positioning

formats.name: Venn Diagram
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a Venn diagram showing overlap between [sets]. Label each region with [contents_or_count].

formats.name: Euler Diagram
formats.use_when: Showing set relationships without false implications
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create an Euler diagram showing [sets] with accurate overlaps. Non-overlapping sets should not touch.

formats.name: Positioning Map
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a positioning map with [x_dimension] and [y_dimension] as axes. Plot [items] at their positions.

formats.name: Bubble Chart
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a bubble chart with [x_axis] horizontal, [y_axis] vertical. Bubble size represents [third_dimension].

categories.name: Evidence / Analytical Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations for intelligence and evidence analysis

formats.name: ACH Matrix
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create an ACH matrix with hypotheses as columns and evidence as rows. Color cells: green=consistent, red=inconsistent, gray=neutral.

formats.name: Confidence Thermometer
formats.use_when: Showing confidence levels for key findings
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a vertical confidence scale from 'Remote' to 'Almost Certain'. Plot [findings] at their confidence levels.

formats.name: Evidence Quality Matrix
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a matrix with source reliability (A-F) as rows and information validity (1-6) as columns. Plot sources.

formats.name: Indicator Dashboard
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create an indicator dashboard with traffic light status for each [indicator]. Include trend arrows.

formats.name: Gap Analysis Visual
formats.use_when: Showing gap between current and desired state
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a gap analysis chart showing [current_state] vs [desired_state] for each [dimension]. Highlight largest gaps.

categories.name: Argumentative / Logical Visualizations
categories.description: Visualizations for arguments, logic, and reasoning structures

formats.name: Argument Tree
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create an argument tree with main [claim] at top. Supporting premises below. Show warrant links.

formats.name: Toulmin Diagram
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a Toulmin model diagram for this argument. Show all six components with connecting arrows.

formats.name: Dialectical Map
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a dialectical map showing [thesis] and [antithesis] as opposing positions, with [synthesis] emerging from their tension.

formats.name: Assumption Web
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a web diagram with [conclusions] at top, supported by chains of [assumptions] below. Show dependencies.

formats.name: Scenario Cone
formats.gemini_prompt_pattern: Create a cone of plausibility diagram from [present]. Show branching paths to different [futures]. Width indicates probability.

must_have: Clear title stating what is shown
All elements labeled or in legend
avoid: Decorative elements that add no information
